results.description: The PC XX1 Eagle 12-speed chain from SRAM is lightweight, quiet and stable. The SRAM PC XX1 chain is made for Eagle 12-speed drives and shines on your mountain bike with a lightweight, durable design and several color options. Hollow pins make the chain light, while the Flow Link™ technology with smooth, flat plates for precise, buttery smooth shifting and almost silent operation. At the same time, the chain is uncompromisingly strong without any loss of performance and extremely wear-resistant. Aesthetes also get their money's worth thanks to the color selection matched to Eagle components. Specifications: Range of application: cross country, all mountain, enduro Gear ratios: 12-speed Technical data: Number of links: 126 Lock type: chain lock (PowerLock™) Rivet type: hollow (hollow pins), chrome-plated Directional: No (chain), Yes (chain lock). Recommended groupsets: X01 Eagle, XX1 Eagle Material: steel Compatibility: - Eagle drives Features: - Inner lugs chrome plated with PVD coating. - Outer link plates nickel plated with PVD coating - Flow Link and Hard Chrome™ technologies for reduced wear and tear - color-matched to Eagle components - quiet, lightweight and durable - strong PowerLock chain lock Technologies: Flow Link™: The ultra-smooth inner link plates of the chain are completely free of edges. This reduces friction on the cassette and chainring. The result: quiet performance and longer component life. The chain design allows for a narrower profile. The chain is thus more torsion-resistant. Due to its smooth outer plates, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher. Hard Chrome™: Chains with Hard Chrome have a four times higher (wear) strength than other SRAM chains. This is due to the machining process for the inner links and rollers. The push pin strength and overall strength are equivalent to current SRAM chains. Chains with Hard Chrome last longer and are extremely stable. PowerLock™ SRAM have developed PowerLock as a tool-free, secure and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. Although the PowerLock chain lock does not require any special tools for assembly, but given the narrow tolerance range of modern drives, each PowerLock can only be used once. X-Sync™: Chains with X-Sync technology are perfectly matched for use with X-Sync chainrings. X-Sync chainrings from SRAM ensure maximum performance and durability. The long X-Sync tooth edges grip the chain earlier than traditional teeth in triangular shape. The sharp and narrow tooth profile and the rounded angled edges support the chain guide.To provide the best possible performance even in muddy terrain, the X-Sync chainrings have depressions to remove dirt and mud for the inner chain links and rollers. Scope of delivery: - 1 x chain SRAM PC XX1 Eagle - 1 x chain lock SRAM PowerLock Weight: 12 speed: 250 g

categories: MTB > Gear change > Gear shift lever
results.description: Three decades ago SRAM was founded - based on a single product called Grip Shift and the thought that the bicycle gearshift should be lighter, better and more intuitive. The completely redesigned XX1 Eagle™ Grip Shift shifter still follows exactly this thought - even though it has been significantly further developed. In the current XX1-Eagle™ shift grip is a new, stable inner workings, which is more durable and makes the shifting even more precise. And like the original, it puts full control in your hands. Weight 143 g Scope of delivery Twist shifter right incl. shift cable, handlebar grip right and left and handlebar end pin Shift lever type Grip Shift MTB groups XX1 Eagle Goods main group Drive parts Category Mountain bike Product subgroup Gear shift lever Activity Cycling Sport Mountain bike Brand Sram Sales unit Piece

results.description: SRAM cranks are strong and durable, ready for any kind of ride. Therefore, it is inevitable that pedal strokes and dirt wear the end of the crank. The carbon crank sleeve from SRAM is an upgrade that counteracts the signs of wear caused by hard riding. The cuff protects the crank from surface damage. For XX1 Eagle and X01 Eagle crank arms: FC-X0-1-B1, FC-X0-1-C1, FC-X0-1-C2, FC-X0-1-C3, FC-X0-1DH-B1, FC-XX-1-B1, FC-XX-1-C1, FC-XX-1-C2 MTB groups X01 Eagle X01 Eagle AXS XX1 Eagle XX1 Eagle AXS Main product group Drivetrain parts Category Mountain bike Product subgroup Cranksets Activity Cycling Sport Mountain bike Brand Sram Sales unit Pair NAV item commission group 820: Sram

categories: MTB > Gear change > Rear derailleur
results.description: The revised XX1 Eagle rear derailleur opens up new worlds for uncompromising racers or dreambike builders. The crisp, precise shifting feel of the XX1 Eagle, on which generations of racers have relied, now gets a new cage shape for even better chain guidance. The XX1 Eagle rear derailleur takes full advantage of the capabilities of the new 10-52 cassette and is still fully backward compatible for 10-50 teeth. categories: MTB > Gear change > Gear shift lever
results.description: The sheer shifting performance of the Eagle AXS™ alone makes a significant difference. Gear changes under full load, in the roughest terrain, uphill or without having to loosen the handlebar grip. The Eagle AXS™ gives you more control over your bike when you are under pressure and give your utmost. In addition, it also changes the way you deal with your bike. With no shift cable and shrouds to consider, the Eagle AXS™ controller opens up a whole new range of possibilities in design and technology. With its ergonomic shift paddles and very low operating forces, we've paved the way for a completely new shifting experience. Using the AXS™ app, you can freely configure the controller to your preferences and determine which controller does what. Feature AXS™ software that allows you to customize and program the new SRAM and RockShox components. Feature Battery CR2032 Weight 69 g Scope of delivery Controller incl. Discrete Clamp (clamp) Shifter type AXS Controller MTB groups X01 Eagle AXS XX1 Eagle AXS Goods main group Drive parts Category Mountain bike Product subgroup Gear shift lever Activity Cycling Sport E-bike Gravel and cyclocross Mountain bike Brand Sram Sales unit Piece NAV Article commission group 820: Sram

categories: MTB > Drive > Crank and chain wheel set
results.description: Real competition guys are always looking for any competitive advantage - a constant hunt for even lighter, stiffer, stronger or more stable equipment. To design the best possible drive, we have scrutinized and revised every detail of the crankset. The latest XX1 Eagle™ CARBON TUNED™ crankset is our lightest, stiffest and strongest crank yet. DUB™ technology optimizes and simplifies the interaction of the crank axle and bottom bracket, improving durability. Our DUB cranksets are simpler, more universal and more durable. Color: black Size: 170mm/34t
